results.description: Integrative Tumor Epidemiology Branch (ITEB) of DCEG conducts large-scale, international epidemiological research on cancer etiology and progression through integrative analyses of risk factors and tissue profiling to inform prevention and clinical strategies.
results.title: Integrative Tumor Epidemiology Branch - Overview - National Cancer Institute

results.description: Recruiting: Bioinformatician in Cancer Genomics for the Integrative Tumor Epidemiology Branch of the NCI Division of Cancer Epidemiology & Genetics. Ph.D. in bioinformatics, cancer genomics, tumor evolution or related field, plus organizational, analytical, and written/oral communication skills. Contact MT Landi.
results.title: Recruiting bioinformatician in Cancer Genomics - National Cancer Institute
